H0.text: At the 2014 Winter Olympic games Elise Christie of Great Britain was disqualified from all three of her events, in which sport. Figure Skating

H1.text: At the 2014 Winter Olympic games Elise Christie of Great Britain was disqualified from all three of her events, in which sport. Alpine Skiing

H2.text: At the 2014 Winter Olympic games Elise Christie of Great Britain was disqualified from all three of her events, in which sport. Bobsleigh

H3.text: At the 2014 Winter Olympic games Elise Christie of Great Britain was disqualified from all three of her events, in which sport. Speedskating

A4.text: Short‑track speed skating was upgraded to a full Olympic sport in 1992 and has been part of the Winter Olympics ever since.

A5.text: In short‑track speed skating, a skater who commits impeding, off‑track, or assistance violations is immediately disqualified.
